text: this is an incredible scene here at los
profetas in Caracas where many thousands
of people are standing in line for hours
on end under the hot Sun waiting to see
the body of President Hugo Chavez who
died on Tuesday it's incredible to see
the intensity that people have for
Chavez just days after his death some of
them have walked for hours to be here
some of them have ridden their
motorcycles here from the bottles of
Caracas some are even composing songs in
his honor
okay Paris
this outpouring of grief and support for
chavez is testament to the sway he had
over Venezuela for almost a decade and a
half it's also evidence of the influence
that his political moment will continue
to have for years to come
citing the examples of Lenin Mao and Ho
Chi Minh Venezuela's government
announced that his body would be
embalmed and displayed eternally
